text.name: information_Motor
text.text: Maintenance required in: %1.1f engine hours or %1.0f day(s)

text.name: information_palletOperatingHours
text.text: Additional operating hours until next maintenance: %1.0f h

text.name: information_palletDays
text.text: Additional days until next maintenance: %1.0f d

text.name: dialog_maintenance_text
text.text: It would be inoperable for %1.0f hour(s), but operational for an additional %1.0f engine hour(s) and %1.0f day(s).

text.name: dialog_AutoMotorStart
text.text: Automatic engine start activated! This disables the engine stall function!

text.name: information_wartung
text.text: Maintenance completed in %1.0f hours and %1.0f minutes

text.name: function_Pallet
text.text: This pallet is used for the maintenance of your vehicles.

text.name: warning_moneyChange
text.text: Maintenance is being executed and will be completed in %1.0f hour(s). The price for this maintenance is %1.0f,- and will be charged to your account.
